title: Submit a Grant Progress Report
description: A non-profit needs to submit its semi-annual progress report for a federal grant.

tasks.description: Identify the non-profit and the specific grant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct grant file.

tasks.description: Guide the user in completing the progress report form, including financial and performance metrics.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the user fill out all required sections of the report.

tasks.description: Accept the submission of the progress report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs the report as submitted on time.
